archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Infrastructure Management
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation:
As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.2.2.1] The purpose of the Infrastructure Management process is to provide the infrastructure and services to projects to support organization and project objectives throughout the life cycle.
See detailed description in the INCOSE Handbook v.4, page 149

properties.value: Gemäß ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288 (laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE): "[6.2.2.1] Der Zweck des Prozesses "Infrastrukturmanagement" besteht in der Versorgung der Projekte mit Infrastruktur (Einrichtungen und Ausrüstung) sowie Dienstleistungen zur Unterstützung der Organisations- und Projektziele während des gesamten Lebenszyklus".

As stated in ISO/IEC/IEEE 15288, [6.2.2.1] The purpose of the Infrastructure Management process is to provide the infrastructure and services to projects to support organization and project objectives throughout the life cycle.
